meanings.definition: Surrounded by or as if by an aureole.
meanings.sent1: The statue in the park looked aureoled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The angelic figure was aureoled with a golden halo.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was aureoled in glory after catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak was aureoled by the mist, creating a mystical aura.
meanings.sent5: Her smile was so radiant, it made her face appear aureoled with happiness.

meanings.sent1: The painting depicted a saintly figure aureoled in divine light.
meanings.sent2: The religious icon was aureoled with a halo of light.
meanings.sent3: The cupcake looked so delicious, it seemed aureoled with temptation.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden was aureoled by the setting sun, giving it a magical glow.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was aureoled with an air of mystery and reverence.
